Reviews.Title: good point and shoot. . nothing fancy!
Reviews.Author: Bridget
Reviews.Content: This  is a great deal for the set and the camera is an easy to figure out point and shoot and the display on the back is large and easy to see and it wss a sony sd card not some cheap chinese junk! My only issue is the camera case was big enough to put a camcorder in! It is bigger than my purse! So I ended ip purchasing a different one. All in all I am happy but it was disappointing to need a new camera case right off tje bat!

ProductInfo.Features:
14Mp Resolution
Dual Image Stabilization
Built-In Flash
720p HD Movie Mode
5x Wide-Angle Zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus VG-160 Digital Camera (Red) 8GB Package
